report.title: Helped Me Withdraw
report.author: Bumpo
report.bodytext: I have been a heroin addict for many years now. I have tried almost everyway to get off the stuff as anyone. Using other opioids : oxycodone, oxycontin, etc. to no avail. Then I ran into a drug called Suboxone and this stuff worked wonders, took the withdrawal symptoms away without getting me high. It seemed like a wonder drug, but like anything else it made me withdraw from it. /n /n This brings me to Tramadol. My dog broke his hipbone and the Vet. prescribed him Tramadol which knocked him out. I researched it a bit and decided to try it. This drug is the first drug I have ever taken to help my withdrawals without giving me withdrawals. Tramadol is helping me get through it, and when I don't take it the effects arent incapacitating like on opiates.
